title: Developing Teacher Competencies in Hybrid Synchronous Video-Mediated Learning Environments: Applying the IT-Pedagogical Think Tank Model [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Fundamental Understanding of Language Education
context.additional_context: Learners primarily access via smartphones, requiring teachers to have capabilities for effective instructional design and execution in hybrid environments

learning_goals: Teachers develop three or more innovative instructional designs for hybrid learning environments using the IT-Pedagogical Think Tank Model.
The teacher team derives video-mediated instructional strategies to improve learner engagement by over 20% through collaboration
The educational institution systematizes the teacher competency development process to ensure over 80% of teachers adapt to the new model within six months

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
